author: Andy Hill
text: I love going to the dentist (yes, read that again) I absolutely love Cross Creeks! Everyone is always so friendly and they even know my name! As soon as I walk in, it's "hi Andy, we got you checked in". The hygienists are always great and, maybe more importantly, they always remember my new free toothbrush! I even get to pick the color! Dr. Melissa knows her stuff and her attention to detail is very much appreciated. And everyone is just great to talk to before, during and after my appointment. I've been going here for many years and I can truly say that Cross Creeks is the very best I've been too, and I'm 52 and I've seen more than a few!üòÅ

author: Amanda Alderman
text: I took my girls and they both needed to have a tooth extracted. They were fantastic explaining every step to them and making sure they were comfortable. Personal calls from the doctor to make sure they were OK made both of them feel cared for. I would definitely recommend Cross Creeks to family and friends.
